identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Main titles, section headers, hero text

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, order IDs

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;800&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Paper Metaphor). Dark Mode Optional (Inverted Blueprint).
rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900.
Backgrounds should have texture (noise) rather than flat color where possible.
Primary action buttons must be solid Slate-900 or Blue-500.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise overlay to the body background to simulate high-quality paper.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Grid Borders' style: 1px solid border-slate-200. Sharp edges or minimal rounding (rounded-sm).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'Cut Paper' shadows: sharp, directional shadows (e.g., shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)]) for buttons and cards.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'Crystal Glass' for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md shadow-sm font-medium px-6 py-3 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md font-medium px-6 py-3
buttons.accent: bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 rounded-md shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg p-6 or p-8. No default shadow. Hover: border-slate-300 shadow-sm.
cards.marketing_card: bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 p-8 rounded-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-transform duration-300

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-md h-11 px-4 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-transparent transition-all

marketing.grid: The 'Tetris' Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8. Use col-span-8 for hero, col-span-4 for supporting visuals.
marketing.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24 or py-32.

dashboard.grid: The 'Control Room' Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Dense data, high information density.

hero_workspace.usage: Hero section background or side visual

motion.hover_effects: Lift on hover (-translate-y-1) for cards. Color shift for buttons.
motion.loading: Use a 'scanning' line animation (left to right gradient) for loading states.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on White, or White on Slate-900. Avoid gray text on gray backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-slate-900) on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (slate-900 as primary, etc).
3. USE SHADCN: Use the provided Shadcn components but OVERRIDE the default styling to match the 'Paper & Ink' aesthetic (sharper corners, higher contrast borders).
4. NO GRADIENTS: Do not use background gradients. Use solid colors or the provided paper texture images.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links.
6. FILE UPLOAD: This is the core feature. Make the upload area massive, inviting, and textured (dashed border-slate-300 bg-slate-50).
7. ADMIN DASHBOARD: Keep it strict and grid-based. No floating cards. Use borders to separate data.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
